name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_83Br
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Br" means the element "bromine" and "83Br" is the isotope "bromine-83" with a half-life of 1.00e-01 days.
